casebody.data:
IN RE: Nomination Petitions of Bernard A. WILLIAMS as a Candidate for the State House of Representatives for the 198th District Appeal of: Hon. Rosita C. Youngblood, Jeffery M. Dickerson, Thomas Bauman, and Janiya Youngblood No. 11 EAP 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. Submitted: April 12, 2018
Decided: April 27, 2018 Margaret M. Stuski, Creative Benefits Inc., 908 W Walnut St., Wormleysburg, PA 17043, (717) 599-2429, for Rosita C. Youngblood, Jeffrey M. Dickerson, Thomas Bauman, and Janiya Youngblood, Appellants. Bernard A. Williams, 2665 Roberts Avenue, Philadelphia, PA 19129, (215) 827-7173, pro se. City Commissioners of Philadelphia, Anthony Clark, Chairman, Room 130 City Hall, Philadelphia, PA 19107, pro se. Kathleen Marie Kotula, Pennsylvania Department of State, PA Dept of State, 306 N Ofc. Bldg. 401 North St., Harrisburg, PA 17120-0500, (717) 783-1657, for Department of State, Participants.

ORDER

PER CURIAM

AND NOW, this 27 th day of April, 2018, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED. Appellants' Application for Leave to File Post-Submission Communication is hereby DENIED as moot.
